com.qmetry.qaf.automation.step

Annotation Type QAFTestStep


  • @Inherited
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface QAFTestStep
    Methods annotated with this annotation will be considered as a test step.

    Whenever Method with this annotation get called you will get the step description in report with pass/fail/not-run status. Furthermore, This annotation facilitate to authoring tests in Behavior driven (BDD) way or in Keyword driven (KWD) way. For BDD, use description as behavior and for KWD use step name as keyword.

    Author:
    chirag.jayswal
    See Also:
    QAFTestStepListener}, {@link MetaData}

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String description
      Specify description of the step including arguments.
      java.lang.String stepName
      if step name is not provided than method name will be considered as step name.
      int threshold
      Optional threshold value in seconds that specifies threshold time for step to complete.

    • Element Detail

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        Specify description of the step including arguments. No of arguments in description must match number of arguments in method signature. Argument in description can be provided by using curly braces {}. For example, Method sign is login(String userName, String pwd) then you can provide description as below:
        • User login with {0} and {1}
        • User login with {userName} and {password}
        Returns:
        description of the step
        Default:
        ""

      • stepName

        public abstract java.lang.String stepName
        if step name is not provided than method name will be considered as step name.
        Returns:
        step name
        Default:
        ""

      • threshold

        public abstract int threshold
        Optional threshold value in seconds that specifies threshold time for step to complete. If threshold specified it will be available in JSON report.
        Returns:
        threshold in seconds
        Default:
        0
